polysaccharides.name: FVP Research Consortium 2024
polysaccharides.title: Polysaccharide Structure & Pharmacology Researchers
polysaccharides.contact: Extraction, purification, structural analysis, immunomodulatory & anti-tumor properties (2024)

polysaccharides.name: FVP-S1 Lung Adenocarcinoma Research Team
polysaccharides.title: Mitochondrial Apoptosis Researchers
polysaccharides.contact: FVP-S1 inhibits A549 cell proliferation & migration, chromosome changes (July 2024)

polysaccharides.name: RSAD2/NF-κB/MAPK Research Team
polysaccharides.title: RAW264.7 Macrophage Immunomodulation Researchers
polysaccharides.contact: FVP-1 increases TNF-α, IL-6, IL-1β, COX-2, iNOS, ROS, phagocytic activity (2024)

protein_FVE.name: FVE Anti-Tumor Protein Research Team
protein_FVE.title: Murine Hepatocellular Carcinoma Researchers
protein_FVE.contact: Enoki protein FVE activates innate & adaptive immunity, anti-tumor vs hepatocellular carcinoma

cultivation_scale.name: Nagano Mushroom General Research Institute
cultivation_scale.title: Japanese Bottle Cultivation Researchers
cultivation_scale.contact: Established 1983, world's first pure-white Enoki-take (1986), Nagano Prefecture

cultivation_scale.name: Spent Mushroom Substrate Research Team
cultivation_scale.title: Anaerobic Digestion Residue Cultivation Researchers
cultivation_scale.contact: Development using SMS anaerobic digestion residue as medium base material

cultivation_scale.name: Japan Enokitake Production Research Team
cultivation_scale.title: Industrial Production Statistics Researchers
cultivation_scale.contact: 113,000 tons production in Japan (2004), most popular bottle cultured mushroom

nutritional_highlights.name: Nutritional Profile Research Team
nutritional_highlights.title: Vitamin B & Protein Composition Researchers
nutritional_highlights.contact: Strain DMRX-1446: 32.06% protein, B1-B12 vitamins, 18 amino acids incl. lysine

nutritional_highlights.name: Golden Needle Mushroom Review Team
nutritional_highlights.title: Culinary Medicine & Health Properties Researchers
nutritional_highlights.contact: Rich in β-glucans, amino acids, polyphenols, terpenoids, sterols, B vitamins, lovastatin (2016)

nutritional_highlights.name: Hypolipidemic Activity Research Team
nutritional_highlights.title: Antioxidant & Lipid-Lowering Researchers
nutritional_highlights.contact: Protein, dietary fibers, peculiar flavor, hypolipidemic & antioxidant properties

frost_tolerance.name: Cold-Responsive Gene Research Team
frost_tolerance.title: Genomic Cold Adaptation Researchers
frost_tolerance.contact: 25 COR genes, 520 cold-adapted enzymes, carbohydrate metabolism at 10°C (2025)

frost_tolerance.name: Ste12-like Transcription Factor Research Team
frost_tolerance.title: Abiotic Stress Tolerance Researchers
frost_tolerance.contact: Overexpression: increased salt, cold, oxidative stress tolerance vs wild-type (2023)

frost_tolerance.name: Antifreeze Compound Research Team
frost_tolerance.title: Glycerol & Trehalose Researchers
frost_tolerance.contact: Antifreeze-like compounds (glycerol, trehalose, proteins) prevent ice crystal formation

cuisine_traditions.name: Japanese Enokitake Cultural Research Team
cuisine_traditions.title: Traditional Cuisine Documentation Researchers
cuisine_traditions.contact: Japanese, Chinese, Korean cuisine traditions, enokitake/Golden Needle Mushroom

decomposer_type.name: White Rot Enzyme Research Team
decomposer_type.title: Ligninolytic Activity Researchers
decomposer_type.contact: White rot decomposer on hardwood (oak, beech, willow, poplar, birch, alder)

fruiting_triggers.name: Winter Mushroom Ecology Research Team
fruiting_triggers.title: Frost-Triggered Fruiting Researchers
fruiting_triggers.contact: Cold essential triggering element, fruits even in February Wisconsin
